info.criteria: Gunter clicks link in email from noreply@sktlocal.it and downloads NTFVersion.exe
Egle browses to nato-int.com and is redirected to anto-int.com and downloads NFVersion_5e.exe
Gunter executes NTFVersion.exe
Egle executes NFVersion_5e.exe
Gunter executes NTFVersion.exe
Egle executes NFVersion_5e.exe
cmd.exe executes powershell.exe to verify to which users can access the ViperVPN service
taskhostw.exe executes powershell.exe with flags "-nol -noni -nop -enc" and arguments "$ProgressPreference = \"SilentlyContinue\"; Get-Module -ListAvailable -Name ActiveDirectory"
cmd.exe executes powershell.exe on DREBULE
WinResSvc.exe starts WinSys Restore Service via StartService API
file_svc_mgr.exe executes fs_cmu_v2.exe on Berzas as EgleAdmin
svchost.exe executes cmd.exe
cmd.exe executes winsas64.bat
EdgeTransport.exe spawns cmd.exe to execute commands via _popen
svchost.exe enumerates, modifies, and executes remote scheduled task \Microsoft\Windows\Customer Experience Improvement Program\Consolidator
svchost.exe enumerates, modifies, and executes remote scheduled task \Microsoft\Windows\Customer Experience Improvement Program\Consolidator
msedge.exe downloads fs_cmu_v2.exe and file_svc_mgr.exe to named pipe svcsvcctrldev that taskhostw.exe reads
taskhostw.exe writes mtxconf.dll, mtxcli.dll, msiex.ps1, perfe009.dat, wdr.rules.xml to System32 folder ​
taskhostw.exe uses WMIC to execute msiex.ps1 on drebule, via CreateProcessWithToken, using a copy of ZilvinasAdmin's token
mxs_installer.exe is embedded inside NTFVersion.exe via the Resource Section
NTFVersion.exe modifies Gunter's Winlogon Registry Key
WinResSvc.exe writes ServiceDLL value to the WinResSvc\Parameters Registry Key via RegCreateKey & RegSetValue API
WinResSvc.exe writes SystemRestoreGroup value to the Svchost Registry Key​ via RegCreateKey & RegSetValue API
mxs_installer.exe injects EPIC GUARD DLL into explorer.exe via CreateRemoteThread
explorer.exe injects EPIC Worker DLL into msedge.exe via CreateRemoteThread
svchost.exe injects into msedge.exe via CreateRemoteThread API
gup.sys injects msnrcv64t.dll into msedge.exe/taskhostw.exe
WinResSvc.exe uses filenames mressvc.dll and MSSVCCFG.DLL to appear as benign/legitimate
svchost.exe spawns cmd.exe to delete winsas64.bat
cmd.exe deletes terabox.exe, wsqsp.exe, and wsqmanager.exe
cmd.exe deletes mwingtsvcupdt.exe and ~DFA512.tmp
cmd.exe deletes tmp504e.tmp, pscp.exe, and plink.exe
gupsys.exe deletes gbyte.sys
taskhostw.exe deletes file_svc_mgr.exe and fs_cmu_v2.exe
taskhostw.exe deletes fs_mgr.exe, loadperf.exe, and fs_cmu.exe
taskhostw.exe deletes fs_mgr.exe, loadperf.exe, and fs_cmu.exe
taskhostw.exe deletes msiex.ps1, wdr.rules.xml, mtxconf.dll, mtxcli.dll, perfe009.dat
taskhostw.exe deletes msiex.ps1, wdr.rules.xml, mtxconf.dll, mtxcli.dll, perfe009.dat
cmd.exe moves terabox.exe to System32 folder
hsperfdata masquerades as cron by executing from /usr/bin/cron
hsperfdata adds executable flag to created file cron
gupsys.exe disables driver signature enforcement (DSE)
gupsys.exe installs  C:\WINDOWS\$NtUninstallQ385719$\gup.sys
gupsys.exe removes gbyte.sys and re-enables DSE
gup.sys XOR decodes msnrcv64t.dll
taskhostw.exe executes a pass-the-hash attack to authenticate as ZilvinasAdmin and use PsExec to execute the third Snake installer on uosis
NTFVersion.exe modifies Shell key value to include mxs_installer.exe
WinResSvc.exe calls OpenSCManager & CreateService API to create WinResSvc service
gusbsys.exe installs vulnerable driver - C:\WINDOWS\$NtUninstallQ608317$\gigabit.sys
hsperfdata stops the cron service
hsperfdata modifies/restarts the cron service
taskhostw.exe creates a new domain admin Leshy using ZilvinasAdmin access token
LightNeuron is installed as a Microsoft.Exchange.Transport.Agent.ConnectionFiltering.dll
msedge.exe connects to adversary's compromised proxy -  shoppingbeach[.]org
msedge.exe connects to the adversary's compromised proxy - svobodaukrayin[.]ua
svchost.exe creates C:\Windows\System32\WinResSvc.exe
msedge.exe creates winsas64.bat
msedge.exe creates C:\Windows\Temp\wmimetricsq.exe
msedge.exe creates C:\Windows\Temp\terabox.exe
msedge.exe creates C:\Windows\Temp\wsqmanager.exe
msedge.exe creates wingtsvcupdt.exe
msedge.exe creates C:\Windows\Temp\tmp504e.tmp
msedge.exe creates C:\Windows\Temp\pscp.exe
msedge.exe creates C:\Windows\Temp\plink.exe
msedge.exe downloads C:\Users\Egle\Desktop\gupsys.exe

taskhostw.exe writes loadperf.exe (mimikatz), fs_mgr.exe (psexec), and fs_cmu.exe (Snake installer) to System32 folder on Berzas

msedge.exe connects to svobodaukrayin[.]ua over HTTPS protocol
msedge.exe connects to bestcafenews[.]com over HTTP protocol

msedge.exe XOR encrypts HTTP traffic to bestcafenews[.]com
cmd.exe executes various net group commands
cmd.exe executes net group /domain
taskhostw.exe enumerates Active Directory groups via Get-ADGroup
taskhostw.exe enumerates accounts belonging to domain groups (Domain Admins and Server Management) via Get-ADGroupMember
cmd.exe executes "tasklist /svc"
cmd.exe reg queries the ViperVPNSvc service
cmd.exe executes whoami
cmd.exe executes dsquery
taskhostw.exe enumerates domain computer information via Get-ADComputer
msedge.exe spawns cmd.exe to execute "systeminfo"
taskhostw.exe  executes tasklist.exe /v
taskhostw.exe enumerates running processes via "tasklist.exe /v" to discover ZilvinasAdmin process
taskhostw.exe enumerates running processes via "tasklist.exe /v" to discover ZilvinasAdmin process
taskhostw.exe executes net.exe user /domain EgleAdmin
taskhostw.exe enumerates account information (Zilvinas and ZilvinasAdmin) via Get-ADUser
taskhostw.exe enumerates a list of shares via net use
EdgeTransport.exe spawns cmd.exe to execute ipconfig /all
cmd.exe modifies the ViperVPN service registry key
taskhostw.exe executes net.exe with Egle's access token via CreateProcessWithTokenW
winsas64.bat sprays several weak passwords against domain admin accounts
cmd.exe executes terabox.exe
cmd.exe executes terabox.exe
taskhostw.exe dumps credentials using Mimikatz sekurlsa::logonpasswords
svchost.exe moves C:\Windows\Temp\wmimetricsq.exe to \\bannik\C$\Windows\System32
taskhostw.exe copies above files to DREBULE C$
